metadata.Title: CVE-2019-11925 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Insufficient boundary checks when processing the JPEG APP12 block marker inthe GD extension could allow access to out-of-bounds memory via amaliciously constructed invalid JPEG input. This issue affects HHVMversions prior to 3.30.9, all versions between 4.0.0 and 4.8.3, allversions between 4.9.0 and 4.15.2, and versions 4.16.0 to 4.16.3, 4.17.0 to4.17.2, 4.18.0 to 4.18.1, 4.19.0, 4.20.0 to 4.20.1.

criterions.comment: hhvm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
